events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position. Thank you for your interest and we will review your materials shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the engineering department based on your experience and skills related to software development.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your case to guide you through the hiring process and assist with any questions you may have.
We have completed the initial screening of your application and found your technical background matches the requirements of the engineer role.
Thank you for your prompt reply confirming your availability to proceed with the next steps of the interview process.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 2 PM UTC. Please prepare accordingly and reach out if you need any accommodations.
